entries.title: Fix live-reload of indexers that exited with an error
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: We fixed an issue that caused indexers that crashed with an error to not reload correctly.

entries.title: Add cli command to output machine-readable project information
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: The new `apibara write-project-info` command outputs machine-readable project information in JSON. Use this to get a list of available indexers and presets.

entries.title: Add source map support for better error reporting
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: We added source map support to the indexer, which will improve error reporting by showing the original source code instead of the compiled code.

entries.title: Reconnect on DNA server errors
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: We changed the indexers to automatically reconnect on DNA server errors.

entries.title: Fix Drizzle plugin support for TimescaleDB
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: We fixed an issue with the Drizzle plugin not correctly working with TimescaleDB. Now the reorg-related tables correctly deduce the user's table names.

entries.title: Add support for 'enum' Starknet events
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: The Starknet event decoder now supports 'enum' events. This means it's now possible to parse a contract's root events.

entries.title: Improve DNA message decoder performance
entries.author: jaipaljadeja
entries.summary: We switched the implementation of the DNA message decoder, resulting in 2x performance improvements. Users streaming large blocks will notice a significant speedup.
